summary: Create a website for VS Studio Photography (owner Vikky Kumar) to promote services and enable bookings.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal monochrome studio logo mark with camera/monogram feel, text “VS Studio Photography” (vs-studio-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide cinematic hero banner photo-style background with subtle bokeh/light leaks, no readable text (vs-studio-hero.dim_1920x800.png)
- Set of 9 cohesive photography-themed gallery placeholder images (wedding/portrait/event motifs), no text (vs-studio-gallery-01.dim_1200x800.png)
- Set of 9 cohesive photography-themed gallery placeholder images (wedding/portrait/event motifs), no text (vs-studio-gallery-02.dim_1200x800.png)
- Set of 9 cohesive photography-themed gallery placeholder images (wedding/portrait/event motifs), no text (vs-studio-gallery-03.dim_1200x800.png)
- Set of 9 cohesive photography-themed gallery placeholder images (wedding/portrait/event motifs), no text (vs-studio-gallery-04.dim_1200x800.png)
- Set of 9 cohesive photography-themed gallery placeholder images (wedding/portrait/event motifs), no text (vs-studio-gallery-05.dim_1200x800.png)
- Set of 9 cohesive photography-themed gallery placeholder images (wedding/portrait/event motifs), no text (vs-studio-gallery-06.dim_1200x800.png)
- Set of 9 cohesive photography-themed gallery placeholder images (wedding/portrait/event motifs), no text (vs-studio-gallery-07.dim_1200x800.png)
- Set of 9 cohesive photography-themed gallery placeholder images (wedding/portrait/event motifs), no text (vs-studio-gallery-08.dim_1200x800.png)
- Set of 9 cohesive photography-themed gallery placeholder images (wedding/portrait/event motifs), no text (vs-studio-gallery-09.dim_1200x800.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive multi-page marketing website for “VS Studio Photography” that prominently displays the business name, owner name (Vikky Kumar), contact phone (7070945104), email (vscomputer7070@gmail.com), and address (Etwarpur Nizamat Chowk, Lalganj, Vaishali, Bihar 844121).
Add core website sections/pages suitable for a photography studio: Home (hero + call-to-action), Services, Gallery, and Contact/Book Now, with navigation between them.

Implement a “Book Now” / booking inquiry form that collects at minimum: name, phone, optional email, event type, preferred date, message/notes; validate required fields client-side and show a clear success/failure status after submission.
Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) appropriate for a photography studio, and use it consistently across all pages.
Add basic SEO and sharing metadata (document title, description) for the VS Studio Photography website.
Add generated static image assets to support the initial site look (logo and hero/banner plus gallery placeholders) and render them directly from the frontend public assets (not via backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a website for VS Studio Photography to showcase services and enable booking/contact.
Create backend storage and APIs in the single Motoko actor to persist booking inquiries submitted from the website and to retrieve them (for future admin use).
